moves.2. g3: going to protect my king as much as i can!
moves.2... Nf6 3. Bg2 e6 4. Bg5: ! i think this is the best move! now, i can go f4 and extra guard my king! (bg5 so i can go f4 without trapping my dark colored bishop)
moves.4... d5 5. f4 Bd6 6. Nf3 O-O 7. O-O c6 8: i think qb6!? is best (attacking b2 and frees his knight from the pin)
moves.8... Nbd7 9. Bxf6 Nxf6 10. Nbd2: i got my two favorite pieces on the board (the knights!)
moves.10... Ng4: threatening ne3 forking the queen and the rook
i want to get my d2 knight to d3 so i can go to e5 and have a better game
moves.19... b4 20. Ne5 a4 21. Reb1 Qc7 22. h3: go g4 with an attack on the king side
moves.22... b3 23. Qd1 Bxe5 24. dxe5: !! now, i can go nd4! and control the board with it!

moving it way out of the way!
! DONT take on d5 with the queen? why: opens the a8-h1 diagonal
